Details: App checks if Zoom token exists.
If no token, user is prompted to log in via Zoom.
User is redirected to Zoom for authentication.
Access and refresh tokens are received and stored securely.
User sees a list of upcoming and past meetings.
User taps on a specific meeting to view details.
Display details like date, duration, participants, and recordings.
Transcript is sent to backend, summary is generated using AI.
User sees AI-generated summary and can edit it.
User can view past summaries, tag them, or share as PDF/text.
